response.overview: Sixty years after World War 2, American Army Veteran Tom Johnson skips out on his family's plan to send him to assisted living and flies to the Netherlands to find the love of his life, translator Sarah van Praag
response.tagline: Sixty years after World War 2, American Army Veteran Tom Johnson skips out on his family's plan to send him to assisted living and flies to the Netherlands to find the love of his life, translator Sarah van Praag.
response.title: Old Heart
